songs.title: Untitled #5
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
I'm drinking that liquor
Like water, like water, like water, like water
She popping her pills
Like water, like water, like water, like water
She pop and she rolling
Like water, like water, like water, like water

[Verse]
I go in, I go to work
I roll up, I smoke the purp
Hit the rich, she hit the chirp
I don't flirt, I make her swerve
That's solo, I ride DoLo
We blow hoes down in Soko
They watch me like a GoPro
Me and 3 hit the weed
He too up, that's guarantee
But my team, we corrupt
With my niggas, my crew yuh
She drink liquor
Like water, like water
She drink it
Like water, like water
I drink it, I sip it, I pour it
Like water, like water, like water, like water

[Hook 2]
I drink it, I sip it
Like water, like water, like water
I get a bitch wet and she dripping
Like water, like water
I get a bitch wet and she dripping
Like water, like water
She drinking the liquor
Like water, like water, like water
She popping, she rolling, she off the drugs
Like its water, like water
I fuck a bitch and I brought the Young Thug
Like water, like water
I don't give a fuck, I feel like I'm on for
The water, the water
